Oh, I guess I should cross post this.

After a month of hard work on an entry for <a href=”https://t.umblr.com/redirect>NESMaker’s Byte Off</a> competition, <a href=”https://t.umblr.com/redirect>Pingback</a> is playable.

Coming up with music that was actually listenable was probably my favorite part of the project.

Please check out all the entries <a href=”https://t.umblr.com/redirect>here</a>.
